html.p: Inputs from E-State Machine
State Machine

variable.name: BatInitializeSt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: State 0: initialize all conditions when PLC restarts.

variable.name: BatNotReadySt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: State 1: Fault or Emergency stop

variable.name: BatReadySt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: State 2: No Fault and system ready to start

variable.name: BatOnlineSt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: State 4: System Online and running. No Fault or alarm

variable.name: BmsChargingSt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: When System BMS detect over

variable.name: BmsDischargingSt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: When System BMS detect over

variable.name: BmsRkPartOnlineSt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: When number of service rack is smaller than number of available rack, this bit set.

variable.name: BmsEStopSPDSt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: This bit is set when the system stop of system alarm is caused by the E-Stop SPD

variable.name: BmsEStopProtSt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: This bit is set when the system stop of system alarm is caused by the E-Stop Protection.

variable.name: BmsEStopPartSt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: This bit is set when the system stop of system alarm is caused by the partial operation.

variable.name: BmsCriticalAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Critical. Stops Batt System without waiting for current to 0

variable.name: BmsNonCriticalAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: to E controller SM. Bring Batt Current to 0 then send Stop command

variable.name: BmsStateTOUT_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: >420s in Starting or Stopping state

variable.name: BmsInitCommsFail_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: fail to establish communication with the BMS when PLC restarts

variable.name: BmsMinRkCloseFail_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Fail to close minimum number of racks on start command

variable.name: BmsMinRkOnlineFail_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: number of racks < minimum required racks while online

variable.name: BmsSysFireAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Battery System Filre Alarm Input

variable.name: BmsEStopAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Battery System Emergency Stop Input

variable.name: BmsExtReadyStNotSetAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: External Batt System Ready to close Status Interlock Not set, system cannot close.

variable.name: BattUSyncErrAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: BATT UdcAct is out of sync with Inv UdcAct, cannot close

variable.name: BmsRTUComAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Battery System Rack voltage imbalance Alarm

variable.name: BmsRTUComFlt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Battery System System Stop Alarm

variable.name: BmsRkVoltImbAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Battery System Rack voltage imbalance Alarm

variable.name: BmsSysStopAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Battery System System Stop Alarm

variable.name: BmsAuxProtAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Battery Rack Auxiliary protection operation

variable.name: BmsDcCntrSensor2Al_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: DC contactor Sensor switch2 Fail

variable.name: BmsFanFailAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Fan Operation Fail [Option] - For fan use products only

variable.name: BmsDcSwCntFailAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Battery Rack DC Switch Count Fail

variable.name: BmsDCFuseSenserFailAl_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: DC Fuse Sensor fail Alarm

variable.name: BmsAuxProtProt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Battery Rack Auxiliary protection operation

variable.name: BmsDcCntrSensor2Prot_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: DC contactor Sensor switch2 Fail

variable.name: BmsFanFailProt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Fan Operation Fail [Option] - For fan use products only

variable.name: BmsDcSwCntFailProt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Battery Rack DC Switch Count Fail

variable.name: BmsDCFuseSenserFailProt_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: DC Fuse Sensor fail Alarm

variable.name: GCDClinkRefCmdValid_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: DC link reference commands Valid

variable.name: GCABBLostCommsStop_Q
variable.comment: SPI/BOOL: Inverter stopped due to Lost Comms

variable.name: BmsRacksNServiceCnt_Q
variable.comment: MFI/USINT: Number of Racks in Service Count

html.p:
LuNumPa := LuNumPa_S;
(*___________________________________________________________*)
(*Grid*)
Grid_Param_In_1();
Grid_Dat[1].Grid_Param	:=Grid_Param_In_1.Grid_Param;
Sys_Parameters		:=Grid_Param_In_1.Sys_Parameters;
Synch_Parameters	:=Grid_Param_In_1.Synch_Parameters;
(*___________________________________________________________*)
(*Feeder*)
Fed_Param_In_1();
Fed_Data[1].Feeder_Param   :=Fed_Param_In_1.Feeder_Param;
Fed_Var_In_2();
HMIFeeder_Var_IN:=Fed_Var_In_2.Feeder_Var_IN;

								

								
(*___________________________________________________________*)
(*Line Up 1*)

								
Ps_Sim_Param_1(										
				Gc_PQ_FU_RefSelPa_S	:=	Gc_PQ_FU_RefSelPa_S		(* INT *),			
				Gc_SNomPa_S	:=	Gc_SNomPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_fDroopPa_S	:=	Gc_fDroopPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_UDroopPa_S	:=	Gc_UDroopPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_TMotorPa_S	:=	Gc_TMotorPa_S		(* TIME *),		
				Gc_TExciterPa_S	:=	Gc_TExciterPa_S		(* TIME *),		
				Gc_P_UpPa_S	:=	Gc_P_UpPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_P_DownPa_S	:=	Gc_P_DownPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_PLimMinPa_S	:=	Gc_PLimMinPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_PLimMaxPa_S	:=	Gc_PLimMaxPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_PinitPa_S	:=	Gc_PinitPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_PNomPa_S	:=	Gc_PNomPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_QLimMinPa_S	:=	Gc_QLimMinPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_QLimMaxPa_S	:=	Gc_QLimMaxPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_QinitPa_S	:=	Gc_QinitPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_QNomPa_S	:=	Gc_QNomPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_OvPFactorPa_S	:=	Gc_OvPFactorPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_OvPLockInTPa_S	:=	Gc_OvPLockInTPa_S		(* TIME *),		
				Gc_OvQFactorPa_S	:=	Gc_OvQFactorPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_OvQLockInTPa_S	:=	Gc_OvQLockInTPa_S		(* TIME *),		
				Gc_OvUFactorPa_S	:=	Gc_OvUFactorPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_OvULockInTPa_S	:=	Gc_OvULockInTPa_S		(* TIME *),		
				Gc_OvFFactorPa_S	:=	Gc_OvFFactorPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_OvFLockInTPa_S	:=	Gc_OvFLockInTPa_S		(* TIME *),		
				BatUNomPa_S	:=	BatUNomPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatSNomPa_S	:=	BatSNomPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatEInitPa_S	:=	BatEInitPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatENomPa_S	:=	BatENomPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatEnDerateWrtSocPa_S	:=	BatEnDerateWrtSocPa_S		(* BOOL *),		
				BatEnDerateWrtTempPa_S	:=	BatEnDerateWrtTempPa_S		(* BOOL *),		
				BatDrtChrgOnSocLookUpSocPa	:=	BatDrtChrgOnSocLookUpSocPa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatDrtChrgOnSocLookUpDrtPa	:=	BatDrtChrgOnSocLookUpDrtPa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatDrtDChrgOnSocLookUpSocPa	:=	BatDrtDChrgOnSocLookUpSocPa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatDrtDChrgOnSocLookUpDrtPa	:=	BatDrtDChrgOnSocLookUpDrtPa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatDerateTempLookUpTempPa	:=	BatDerateTempLookUpTempPa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatDerateTempLookUpDeratePa	:=	BatDerateTempLookUpDeratePa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatPNomMinPa_S	:=	BatPNomMinPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatPNomMaxPa_S	:=	BatPNomMaxPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatUMaxPa_S	:=	BatUMaxPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatUMinPa_S	:=	BatUMinPa_S		(* REAL *),
				Sys_Parameters	:=	Sys_Parameters	,
				BattTotalRackCntPa_S	:=	BattTotalRackCntPa_S(* USINT *),
				BattPartMinRackCntPa_S	:=	BattPartMinRackCntPa_S(* USINT *)

								
);										
PS[1].BMS.In.Param	:=	Ps_Sim_Param_2.BMS_Param_In;				
PS[1].Gc.In.Param	:=	Ps_Sim_Param_2.Gc_Param_In;
(*___________________________________________________________*)
(*Line Up 2*)

				BatUNomPa_S	:=	BatUNomPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatSNomPa_S	:=	BatSNomPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatEInitPa_S	:=	BatEInitPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatENomPa_S	:=	BatENomPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatEnDerateWrtSocPa_S	:=	BatEnDerateWrtSocPa_S		(* BOOL *),		
				BatEnDerateWrtTempPa_S	:=	BatEnDerateWrtTempPa_S		(* BOOL *),		
				BatDrtChrgOnSocLookUpSocPa	:=	BatDrtChrgOnSocLookUpSocPa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatDrtChrgOnSocLookUpDrtPa	:=	BatDrtChrgOnSocLookUpDrtPa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatDrtDChrgOnSocLookUpSocPa	:=	BatDrtDChrgOnSocLookUpSocPa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatDrtDChrgOnSocLookUpDrtPa	:=	BatDrtDChrgOnSocLookUpDrtPa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatDerateTempLookUpTempPa	:=	BatDerateTempLookUpTempPa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatDerateTempLookUpDeratePa	:=	BatDerateTempLookUpDeratePa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatPNomMinPa_S	:=	BatPNomMinPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatPNomMaxPa_S	:=	BatPNomMaxPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatUMaxPa_S	:=	BatUMaxPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatUMinPa_S	:=	BatUMinPa_S		(* REAL *),
				Sys_Parameters	:=	Sys_Parameters	,
				BattTotalRackCntPa_S	:=	BattTotalRackCntPa_S(* USINT *),
				BattPartMinRackCntPa_S	:=	BattPartMinRackCntPa_S(* USINT *)

								
);										

								
PS[2].BMS.In.Param	:=	Ps_Sim_Param_2.BMS_Param_In;				
PS[2].Gc.In.Param	:=	Ps_Sim_Param_2.Gc_Param_In;
(*___________________________________________________________*)
(*Line Up 3*)

								
Ps_Sim_Param_3(										
				Gc_PQ_FU_RefSelPa_S	:=	Gc_PQ_FU_RefSelPa_S		(* INT *),

				BatDrtChrgOnSocLookUpDrtPa	:=	BatDrtChrgOnSocLookUpDrtPa		(* DerateLookUp *),

				BatDerateTempLookUpDeratePa	:=	BatDerateTempLookUpDeratePa		(* DerateLookUp *),		
				BatPNomMinPa_S	:=	BatPNomMinPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatPNomMaxPa_S	:=	BatPNomMaxPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatUMaxPa_S	:=	BatUMaxPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				BatUMinPa_S	:=	BatUMinPa_S		(* REAL *),
				Sys_Parameters	:=	Sys_Parameters	,
				BattTotalRackCntPa_S	:=	BattTotalRackCntPa_S(* USINT *),
				BattPartMinRackCntPa_S	:=	BattPartMinRackCntPa_S(* USINT *)

								
);

PS[3].Gc.In.Param	:=	Ps_Sim_Param_3.Gc_Param_In;
(*___________________________________________________________*)
(*Line Up 4*)

								
Ps_Sim_Param_4(										
				Gc_PQ_FU_RefSelPa_S	:=	Gc_PQ_FU_RefSelPa_S		(* INT *),

				Sys_Parameters	:=	Sys_Parameters	,

				BattPartMinRackCntPa_S	:=	BattPartMinRackCntPa_S(* USINT *)

								
);										
PS[4].BMS.In.Param	:=	Ps_Sim_Param_4.BMS_Param_In;				
PS[4].Gc.In.Param	:=	Ps_Sim_Param_4.Gc_Param_In;
(*___________________________________________________________*)
(*Line Up 5*)
Ps_Sim_Param_5(										
				Gc_PQ_FU_RefSelPa_S	:=	Gc_PQ_FU_RefSelPa_S		(* INT *),			
				Gc_SNomPa_S	:=	Gc_SNomPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_fDroopPa_S	:=	Gc_fDroopPa_S		(* REAL *),

				Gc_QinitPa_S	:=	Gc_QinitPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_QNomPa_S	:=	Gc_QNomPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_OvPFactorPa_S	:=	Gc_OvPFactorPa_S		(* REAL *),		
				Gc_OvPLockInTPa_S	:=	Gc_OvPLockInTPa_S		(* TIME *),		
				Gc_OvQFactorPa_S	:=	Gc_OvQFactorPa_S		(* REAL *),
